data.text: @robweir @pwthornton Nice. I like the top - willl watch this tomorrow.

@pwthornton @dkiesow I show this talk in my web design class: https://t.co/s9DfnWu01k 

I love the little short movie with the talk/gesture interface. “Call Hererdeau"

@dkiesow It’s such a good example of something that immediately would fall apart with a simple prototype, which is a good reason to not go straight from design to build. 

A lot of futurism looks cool but is quite unusable.
@pwthornton I always use that movie in lectures. Gesture UI is great if you plan to spend a lot of “arm” time in the gym anyway. So absurd.
